channel.title: [Blue dragon investigative] The Partician
channel.description:
>**The Partician** _Blue dragon investigative/offensive (not sure which)_ **Passive: Second class royal** You can step up to become king during the royal phase if their are no other living royals **Day ability: Invitation** _(2 uses)_ Your target will be redirected to visiting you tonight. **Night ability: After-party** _(usable only the night after a member of the cult/unseen is executed; infinite uses)_ Select two players. The players they attempt to visit tonight will be immune to visits for the night **Night ability: Reception** _(infinite uses)_ Select 4 players (3 players if 7 or less alive, 2 if 5 or less alive). You will learn how many of each faction are among them*. You cannot target a player with this ability more than twice.
>**The Grandee** _Unseen offensive_ **Passive: Second class royal** You can step up to become king during the royal phase if their are no other living royals **Day ability: Restraining order** _(4 uses)_ If your target attempts to visit a member of the unseen tonight, they will be occupied. **Day ability: Invitation** _(1 use)_ Your target will be redirected to visiting you tonight **Night ability: Slander** _(4 uses)_ Make your target appear suspicious to investigators for the night **Night ability: Heroic tales** _(2 uses)_ Make the target member of the unseen (possibly yourself) appear as a member of the blue dragon to investigators for the night
*Example: You select the prince, the butler, the assassin, and the reaper **You see 2 blue dragon, a conspirator, and a neutral**
Conspirator stands for cult and unseen, so you do not know which is present.

item.title: [Blue dragon investigative] The Partician
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
yes but keep in mind:

-prince must be dead
-all real princesses must be dead
-drunks must be dead
-all nobles must be dead

this is a lot, and even then someone could be an aristocrat lying about being partician

Read full topic

item.title: [Blue dragon investigative] The Partician
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
There’s plenty of times evils are the only claimed royals though

Read full topic

item.title: [Blue dragon investigative] The Partician
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
take this as an example:

-one princess dead
-two princess claims as of now, one is evil

patrician can’t do a thing

Read full topic

item.title: [Blue dragon investigative] The Partician
item.dc:creator: Margaret
item.description:
This would be easy to tell if real or not depending on it there is still a Drunk or Prince. Otherwise, this class is almost unstoppable. Don’t like how it goes with the kingdom theme though.

Read full topic

item.title: [Blue dragon investigative] The Partician
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
My point is patrician confirms all other royal blood claims fake. That’s way too strong.

Read full topic

item.title: [Blue dragon investigative] The Partician
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
You also forget that an evil royal could claim to be partician so all the other royals die.

Read full topic

item.title: [Blue dragon investigative] The Partician
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Moleland:

MM claimed Princess and was beaten to step up by patrician? GG

People would wonder why they weren’t stepping up in the first place.

Moleland:

Someone fake claiming drunk and patrician stepped up? GG

Very hard to fake claim drunk except as alocholic. You would die to the claim from something else first.

Read full topic

item.title: [Blue dragon investigative] The Partician
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
That passive is too strong. MM claimed Princess and was beaten to step up by patrician? GG

Someone fake claiming drunk and patrician stepped up? GG

Read full topic

item.title: [Blue dragon investigative] The Partician
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
The Partician
Blue dragon investigative/offensive (not sure which)
Passive: Second class royal
You can step up to become king during the royal phase if their are no other living royals
Day ability: Invitation
(2 uses) Your target will be redirected to visiting you tonight.
Night ability: After-party
(usable only the night after a member of the cult/unseen is executed; infinite uses) Select two players. The players they attempt to visit tonight will be immune to visits for the night
Night ability: Reception
(infinite uses) Select 4 players (3 players if 7 or less alive, 2 if 5 or less alive). You will learn how many of each faction are among them*. You cannot target a player with this ability more than twice.

The Grandee
Unseen offensive
Passive: Second class royal
You can step up to become king during the royal phase if their are no other living royals
Day ability: Restraining order
(4 uses) If your target attempts to visit a member of the unseen tonight, they will be occupied.
Day ability: Invitation
(1 use) Your target will be redirected to visiting you tonight
Night ability: Slander
(4 uses) Make your target appear suspicious to investigators for the night
Night ability: Heroic tales
(2 uses) Make the target member of the unseen (possibly yourself) appear as a member of the blue dragon to investigators for the night

*Example: You select the prince, the butler, the assassin, and the reaper
You see 2 blue dragon, a conspirator, and a neutral

Conspirator stands for cult and unseen, so you do not know which is present.

Read full topic
